version_description: Bug fix for inappropriate popup dialog when user add event in the calendar

Bug fix
- When todo title is modified, it is not reflected (fixed)
- Past star expiration alarm is deleted (fixed)

Bug fix
- Premium account check error after subscription (fixed)
- App crash when checking event detail (fixed)

Bug fix
- premium account sync problem fixed
- Category list display error fixed

■4.0更新版本
全新的4.0版本，能让使用者更容易地管理时间。

■新增的快捷窗口
说明更简单，输入更快速。

■直接修改详细内容
不需到详细页面编辑内容。使用者可直接在内容上面修改内容。

■Bug fix

■4.0更新版本
全新的4.0版本，能让使用者更容易地管理时间。

■新增的快捷窗口
说明更简单，输入更快速。

■直接修改详细内容
不需到详细页面编辑内容。使用者可直接在内容上面修改内容。

-App crash bug fixed
-Alert option display bug fixed
-Google calendar categorizing bug fixed
Bug fixed
Bug fixed

- Purchase process improvement
- Social signup process improvement

- Performance improvement
- Account delete menu added under setting
App Crash bug fixed

主题
更换主题设置改变看看TimeBlocks App的气氛。您可以在应用内商店选择主题。

App crash bug fixed

■字体发行
请以多样的字体感受日程确认的乐趣吧。

■卡通物贴纸发行
请用卡通物贴纸把日历制作的更加丰富吧 现在就可以在商铺里确认

-Interval displaying bug fixed
-Landscape mode support (Landscape mode optimization to be provided)

- App crash while applying font fixed
- Bug related to displaying interval fixed

■New items
New stickers and color packs have been added. Check it out now.
Bug fix

- Bug fixed
- 2019 holidays added
'Facebook log in' processing bug fixed

■iCloud日历手动同步功能
为提供更快的同步服务，Time Blocks提供iCloud日历手动同步功能。

■添加导入功能
使用者还可在TimeBlocks导入只保存于手机里面的日程。导入的消息可同步及自动复原于多个终端设备。

- iCloud calendar sync bug fixed
- Todo badge counting bug fixed
- Supporting OS version is changed to iOS 10 above.

-iCloud calendar sync bug fixed
If you have a issue related iCloud calendar sync, we recommend that you disconnect with iCloud and connect again.

-Default Event Category resetting bug fixed
-Interval displaying bug fixed
-iCloud invited events syncing supported

-iCloud Birthday, Subscribed calendar sync supported
-Calendar widget display bug in iPad fixed
-Badge display bug fixed
-Todo repeating bug fixed

■模板顺序调整
日历日程模板可以随意修改。把重要的日程放到显眼的位置吧。
■日期背景色
用不同颜色标注重要的日程安排。在商店里有很多种类商品
■调色助理
您设置背景颜色觉得很麻烦吗？利用调色助理功能吧。它选择和其他日程背景搭配好看的颜色自动设置。打开一下调色助理功能。
■颜色标注 (高级)
颜色标注给不同日程添加颜色。
■倒计时 (高级)
不要忘记生日、纪念日！倒计时提醒重要日程。

-Adjusting the order of blocks for iOS events fixed
-Adding event interface fixed when using bluetooth keyboard

- Calendar background color (Mono) bug fixed
- Repeat bug fixed

■管理习惯
每天要做的习惯，请与日程、TODO一起进行管理。

Habit-related bugs fixed
Repeating events-related bugs fixed

- Calendar blocks displaying bug fixed
- Evernote connection feature is no longer supported (Please check our announcement in the website for more information)
App crash bug fixed when navigating to previous/next month
App crash bug fixed when navigating to previous/next month
App crash bug fixed when using custom event repeat.
App crash bug fixed when syncing

■该日期的其他信息
请在日程目录下端更加轻松快捷的确认
‘该日期的其他信息’
Bug fixed

- Habit date displaying bug fixed
- Lunar date displaying bug fixed
Naver calendar sync error fixed

推出名画系列主题
- 提供的主题是世界名画。第一个主题是梵高的作品。
App crash bug fixed
Minor bugs fixed
- App crash bug fixed on iOS 13 beta

• 支持对于长期间的日期背景
- 现在可以把覆盖多个日期的背景色以开始-结束一次性进行设定。
Facebook login error on iOS 13 fixed
- Habit bug fixed (now you can delete in the list)
Minor bugs fixed

• 提供D-DAY选项 (高级账号)
在之前的倒计时功能基础上添加了纪念日选项。

• 图案日期背景
使用圆点、斜线等，可与众不同得强调日期。

• 延长阴历反复期限
之前所提供的20年阴历反复，延长为从起始日起100年反复期限。(仅适用于新生成的反复)

• 修复了一些漏洞
• 提升了软件性能，优化了用户体验

• 霓虹实心线
重要日期更一目了然；简单的实心线，让你的日历更简洁

• TimeBlocks高级活动
1万5千用户都在使用 TimeBlocks高级版
如有计划购买高级版，请不要错过机会 免费获得30硬币，可以购买日历项目。

• 停止支持手机日历同步
从2020.01.01开始不支持手机日历同步。为了查看之前的日程，请在设置指南中确认。
Minor bug fixed

-Minor bug fixed
-If you want to add national holidays, go to side menu, press + button on the TimeBlocks account. Then you will see option for subscribing holidays

• App crash bug fixed
• Bug in displaying Google calendar events fixed
Minor bugs fixed

- Bug fix for shared category
- App crash issue fixed
- App crash bug fixed
Bug fixed in shared category

• 改善自动退出问题
解决了服务连接超负荷时发生的自动退出问题。

• 推出30个全新贴纸。
现在到商城确认充满个性的
画家们的各种贴纸。
Crash bug fixed when login

• 活动建议通知选项
提供能关闭新活动建议通知的选项。

-Google calendar / task sync bug fixed
-Sign in with Apple id supported
-Google task sync bug fixed

If you have issues when you update TimeBlocks to the 5.0 version.
Please follow the instructions below

• When calendar data disappeared
Please go to the side menu - settings, then scroll down to the 'Restoring the database' menu and click.
Even after this, if you still have an issue, please send us an email at support@timeblocks.com
Notice) DO NOT delete TimeBlocks app if you don't have TimeBlocks id.

• iCloud calendar sync bug fixed (Resolved on Dec 18)

• When all color-coded events are showed with one color (Resolved on Dec 16)
This happened because color palettes info was not downloaded when you updated.
Please go to the store tab on the bottom. then please redownload color palettes which you used before.
If you click the 'purchased' button in the color palette detail page, you can redownload.

• When the font is displayed inappropriately (Resolved on Dec 16)
Please set your font to default font in the side menu - settings

• When event blocks are displayed at the wrong position (Resolved on Dec 16)

• When category show/hide buttons are not working properly (Resolved on Dec 16)

• App crashes when you set time (Resolved on Dec 17)


If you are experiencing any other issue, please let us know
at support@timeblocks.com
